Welcome

The Information Technology era thrives on Computer Science at its essence. Grasping the realm of computer science stands crucial for society to fully capitalize on the boundless benefits offered by Information Technology and expedite economic progress. Computer science involves crafting applications facilitating our daily computer usage, fostering the software systems supporting these applications, and adopting reliable, accurate, and ethical means to shape applications and systems. At the heart of Computer Science lies computer programming expertise. Employers seeking our Computer Science and Information Technology graduates should anticipate proficient programmers that are well-versed in modern methodologies ,tools, adept at applying solid engineering principles to develop, construct, and uphold modern computer programs.

Mission

2016
Throughout our enduring commitment, we have championed technological innovation in our promotions over an extended period.

"Redefining Boundaries: Shaping Tomorrow's Possibilities"

Here at our CS department, the future is not just a concept; it's a canvas waiting for your unique imprint. We believe in fostering a dynamic learning environment where creativity meets technology, where curiosity fuels discovery, and where your aspirations become the blueprint for progress. Join us as we embark on a quest to engineer the future, breaking boundaries, and redefining possibilities. Your journey begins here, where innovation converges with expertise, paving the way for a world where your contributions shape the very fabric of technological evolution.

Our family

Our tight-knit family thrives on love and support, embracing challenges as opportunities for growth and innovation.With open arms, we invite you to join this family of trailblazers, where your journey will be nurtured by unwavering support, enabling you to achieve the unimaginable.Here, we foster a culture of fearlessness and encouragement, urging each member to embark on audacious endeavors that defy conventional limits.

Our Organisation

The University of Ghana is one of the Africa's most preeminent public universities. Our impact on individuals, our region and the world is profound. whether we are launching young people into a boundless future or confronting the grand challenges of our time through dauntless research. UG educates more than 38,000students annually, with approximately 2.64% being computer science students. We turn ideas into impact and transform the world around us. For more about our impact, visit our news site, UG News.
